alert.note: Alert for McLean; Mountrail; Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 7:05PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL WARD, NORTHWESTERN MCLEAN AND SOUTHEASTERN MOUNTRAIL COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM CDT... At 705 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Roseglen, or 24 miles northwest of Garrison, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Makoti around 720 PM CDT. Ryder around 725 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
